github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Subject: Imperative verb. < 72 chars. Summarize core change.
Body (if needed, put AFTER one empty line): Use bullets (-) starting with a past tense verb (Added, Updated).
Bullets: Describe the main outcome/purpose of changes. AVOID listing minor details (like every new property).
NO EXPLANATIONS: Bullets state ONLY what changed. NO 'why' (like 'for consistency', 'to improve performance').
